Articles.Content:
I've just purchased KSP for my son and I. I had a very pleasant experience over at the steam forums so I thought I'd go ahead and register over here too.

We're both rabid Space Engineers fans and I've been following the development of KSP for a long while now. I'm really into building miners and habitats,he's into designing a wide variety of ships and blowing them up,I think he likes blowing them up more myself,but he's come up with some really kool designs. He's 10 years old now and a math wiz kid so I thought it was time to give KSP a shot and see what we can do with it.

My current experience with KSP is very limited and as complex as I've discovered it is I'm sure I'll be asking a TON of questions.

Looking forward to seeing you all in the trenches,or around the water cooler,whatever the current rage is. o/
The two of you are welcome here.
